1190190.name: Nick Reckless in The Curse of the Lost Cause
1190190.description:
A long-lost treasure cast a curse on his entire family,
His destiny is no longer in his control,
Could this journey turn the tide?

Venture through the lost worlds where it all began.
Find your way on a path strewn with pitfalls.
Overcome all the obstacles that stand between you and your fate,
And bring back the stolen treasure, hoping to lift...
The curse of the lost cause.

  • Unravel the mysteries of old-school gameplay in this classic 2D platformer.
  • Explore 4 different environments, each with their own set of traps and enemies.
  • Make your way through procedurally generated levels for ever-changing play sessions.
